samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of the JavaScript drop-down tree control with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Icons and Images
samples.description: The dropdown tree items can be rendered with any custom icons. This sample demonstrated like a file system with custom icons and images.

samples.name: Checkbox
samples.description: This demo demonstrates the drop-down tree control with checkbox functionality

samples.name: Multiple Selection
samples.description: The drop-down tree control allows to select multiple items by pressing CTRL key, also can select the range of items by pressing SHIFT key.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of each item in the JavaScript drop-down tree control pop-up item using the template.

samples.name: Custom Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the display text of the selected items in the JavaScript drop-down tree control using the customTemplate.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how the filtering functionalities works based on the typed characters in the JavaScript drop-down tree control.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with local data source in the JavaScript drop-down tree control.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with remote data source in the JavaScript drop-down tree control.
